about.title: About Me
about.p1: FullStack Developer in constant evolution, passionate about creating solutions that actually work. With practical experience in Python, React and automation with n8n during my internship at AllTech Digital.
about.p2: I always seek to learn and apply new technologies in a practical way. I value teamwork, agile methodologies like Scrum, and developing solutions that positively impact people's daily lives.
about.p3: Advanced English — advanced communication, reading and writing, near fluency.
